title: I feel sorry for this Katarina...
body:
Like, really sorry for this Katarina... 4 trolls on the one team and who ever was playing Katarina, had to put up with them.

"During Game" - http://i.imgur.com/YCgXXle.jpg
"After Game" - http://i.imgur.com/uzkECU8.jpg

Now, this isn't a ranked match, it was normal, but after queuing for a match, and stuff, came along a game with this, and I felt sorry for the 1 person who was on that team. I have reported those 4 who were trolling the game, intentionally feeding, but I do not want an easy game like that again.

replies.body: Ruins the fun for everyone, including the people on the enemy team

Premades are unfortunate to run across in nearly any game because there is always some form of douchebaggery involved with premades.

I've met very few actually good Premades.
You must be the first person i have ever met who feels sorry for a katarina, i feel sorry for you and your team for having to deal with that %%%%.
the only people I have a problem with in that game is the TF, such a scrub going AD, 90% of tf players are hell garbo too, the kat deserved to get trolled, honor tristana for feeding.
